short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it very easy to add new bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension compliments the self-hosted Easy Bookmark Manager project (https://github.com/devimust/easy-bookmark-manager) to make adding new bookmark items as painless as possible.
